The entities that [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsFixedJoint] references are not checked or reported, so this property only returns `false`.

# checksForInternalCollisions

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the joint checks and reports collisions between the two entity instances.

## Declaration

```swift
let checksForInternalCollisions: Bool
```

## Discussion

The entities that [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsFixedJoint] references are not checked or reported, so this property only returns `false`.
title: checksForInternalCollisions
